description.value:
Requirements: You are riding your mount and wielding a
jousting weapon.

You attempt to knock an opponent off their mount. Make a melee @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Strike]{Strike} against a mounted opponent. If your attack hits, attempt an Athletics check against the opponent's Fortitude DC. If you succeed, the foe is knocked off its mount into a space of its choice adjacent to its mount. If you critically succeed, it lands @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}.
